Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Subject to an appropriation for the 2027-2028 state fiscal year, provides that farmers shall receive an exemption from tolls when transporting products to the city of New York for consumption in such city
Summary: Provides that farmers shall receive an exemption from tolls when transporting products to the city of New York for consumption in such city, subject to an appropriation for the 2027-28 state fiscal year.
LawCode: Add ยง2859, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing toll exemptions for farmers transporting their goods to the city of New York
